Package com.example.cms.Suggestions

Class Suggestion

java.lang.Object
com.example.cms.Suggestions.Suggestion
public class Suggestion extends Object
Entity class to handle each suggestion of a camp. Has get and set methods for information about each suggestion, as well as a method to print all the information about the suggestion.

    • Suggestion

      public Suggestion(String suggestion_Subject, String committee, String content, LocalDate dateSubmitted, Status status, boolean processed)
      Creates new suggestion with all the specific information provided.
      Parameters:
      suggestion_Subject - Header of this suggestion
      committee - Which committee this suggestion came from
      content - Body of this suggestion
      dateSubmitted - Date on which this suggestion was submitted
